level.text: A record of the proceedings of the Commission shall be kept and files shall be maintained.

The Department shall and the Commission may maintain a register of all applicants for registration showing for each applicant the date of the application, name, qualifications, place of business, place of applicant's residence, and whether the certificate was granted or denied.
The books and register of the Commission shall be prima facie evidence of all matters recorded therein.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-20, in subsec. (b), substituted "The Department shall and the Commission may" for "the Commission shall".

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2324 of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2062(d) of Fiscal Year 2008 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-74, July 25, 2007, 54 DCR 7549).
